meanings.definition: To stay beyond the time limit.
meanings.sent1: Please do not overstay your welcome at the party.
meanings.sent2: If you overstay your parking time, you might get a ticket.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally overstay at the library and missed my bus!
meanings.sent4: Her perfume seemed to overstay in the room long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The smell of burnt popcorn overstay in the kitchen for hours.

meanings.sent1: We should not overstay our visit and inconvenience our hosts.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to overstay at the beach when the weather is perfect.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to overstay on the windowsill, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song overstay in my mind all day.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of excitement overstay in the air as the event approached.
